subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Walt Weiss was a quick study as a player, earning the American League Rookie of the Year award in 1988, but he knows he must learn as he goes as the manager of the Rockies.
snippet: Walt Weiss was a quick study as a player, earning the American League Rookie of the Year award in 1988, but he knows he must learn as he goes as the manager of the Rockies.
